page.title: 10Living in Bearwood (7)
page.content: We asked people in Bearwood some questions as to{why they chose to live here. About{80%}of the families had lived here for over{10}years. Many had two or even three generations living close by. People liked this area for several reasons. The most common was that Bearwood has a nice{friendly community where it was easy to make new friends. Other reasons were the wide variety of {shops and the two nice parks. Most people didn't like the{noisy and {dangerous traffic}nor the{dirty {pavements. Many said they would not move even if they were able to. The favourite area to move to was Worcestershire.
